card_text: 2 monsters, including a Fiend monster$NDuring the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up card you control; destroy it, then you can apply 1 of these effects.$N●Place 1 "Abyss Playhouse - Fantastic Theater" from your Deck, face-up in your Field Zone.$N●Place 1 "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monster from your Deck in your Pendulum Zone.$NYou can only use this effect of "Abyss Actor - Super Producer" once per turn.
